name: Car(d) Race
description:
Car(d) Race was made for the 41st LudumDare gamejam in the compo category.

The theme was "combine 2 incompatibe genres" and I picked "racing" and "cards".

I'm mainly a programmer, so prepare to be dissapointed :D I poured my heart and soul (and about 28 hours) into this game, so I really hope you'll enjoy it, despite it being janky and buggy.
